title: Welcome to Note Padüìù
content:
Welcome to Notepad!. This is a online text editor. App gives you quick and simple notepad experience.


Features -

  • It supports multi formats and styles in notepad.
  • You can save your work temporally on the browser.
  • You can also save your work on our cloud and access on different machines when ever you want.
  • Application is completely free for you.


Created by -

Karthik S (kar-21)
